description: A meta-decorator that overrides the default parameters or behaviors of other decorators. This enables customization of standard decorators without modifying their definitions, allowing for reuse of established patterns with specific adjustments.

parameters.name: decorator
parameters.description: The specific decorator whose behavior to override

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: JSON string specifying the parameters to override (e.g., '{"depth": "comprehensive", "focus": "methodology"}')

parameters.name: behavior
parameters.description: Optional custom behavior modification instructions that override the standard decorator interpretation

examples.description: Basic parameter override for a standard decorator
examples.usage:
+++Override(decorator=StepByStep, parameters={"numbered": true, "steps": 7})
Explain how to bake bread.
examples.result: Applies the StepByStep decorator to explain bread baking, but overrides its default parameters to ensure exactly 7 numbered steps

examples.description: Complex behavior override with custom instructions
examples.usage:
+++Override(decorator=Debate, parameters={"perspectives": 2}, behavior=instead of presenting neutral perspectives, adopt strongly opposing viewpoints with clear advocacy for each position)
Discuss the ethics of gene editing.
examples.result: Uses the Debate decorator structure for discussing gene editing ethics, but modifies its standard neutral approach to present strongly advocated opposing positions
